query: "Did the assessment using Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test show any concerns about my alcohol consumption back in September 2020?"
resource_summaries: This record is about a completed procedure for assessing alcohol use disorders using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption. The assessment was performed on September 2, 2020, and the location was at PCP167180.
answer: Yes, the assessment using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption was performed on September 2, 2020, at PCP167180. The results of the assessment will provide information about any concerns regarding your alcohol consumption during that time.
